00010 void TranslationManager::add_translation(boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation)
00011 {
00012     if (!this->contains_translation(translation->get_long_name()))
00013     {
00014         m_translations[translation->get_long_name()] = translation;
00015         m_verse_tree->add_child(translation->get_verse_item_tree(), VerseTreeItem::translation);
00016     }
00017 }
00018 
00019 boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> TranslationManager::at(const std::string& translation_long_name) const
00020 {
00021     if (this->contains_translation(translation_long_name))
00022     {
00023         return m_translations.find(translation_long_name)->second;
00024     }
00025     else
00026     {
00027         throw TranslationNotFound();
00028     }
00029 }
00030 
00031 boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> TranslationManager::get_verse_item_tree() const
00032 {
00033     return m_verse_tree;
00034 }
00035 
00036 bool TranslationManager::contains_translation(const std::string& translation_long_name) const
00037 {
00038     return m_translations.find(translation_long_name) != m_translations.end();
00039 }
00040 
00041 // This should really use boost iterator adpater to only return the Translation objects.

00043 {
00044     return m_translations.begin();
